attributes.action: Give parents a right to receive pupil funding if their child is out of school
attributes.additional_details:
Many children out of school receive no education from schools or local authorities.
 
Schools continue to receive funding even if a child is not receiving an education. This can put parents into an awful predicament. If a child is not receiving an education at a school, pupil funding for that child should be made available to their parents for their education outside of school.
attributes.background: There are many children outside of education for many reasons, up and down the country. If a child is not able to attend school, then pupil funding must immediately be made available to their parents to go towards their education
